Reviews.Title: Perfect cleaner for the sensor, I used it for a Lumix GF3
Reviews.Author: Ulises
Reviews.Content: It cleaned the sensor perfectly, it had some water stains.It was also dirty from another lousy cleaner I tried to use

Reviews.Title: My photos no longer look like my glasses after frying bacon.
Reviews.Author: Alfred R. Marzian "tightwad"
Reviews.Content: I have been reluctant to do a wet clean of my sensor, but I decided that if I screwed it up I can justify buying a new camera.I followed the instructions and watched a few videos on the subject. After three passes the sensor was as clean as new.This product works well, and the extra goodies included is just icing on the cake.  Just don't get the icing or cake on your sensor.
